title: Teacher Inquiry-Based Professional Learning for Integrating Learning Design and Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic lesson design skills and ability to interpret data
context.additional_context: Current practitioners explore analyzing learner data using digital tools and incorporating findings into lesson design; project-based assessment to strengthen social studies job competencies

learning_goals: During the instructional design phase, learners can collect and interpret learner data using learning analytics tools (LMS, visualization software, etc.)
Through teacher inquiry processes, learners can propose customized lesson design plans reflecting analysis results
A team-based project can apply an integrated learning design-analysis model to develop field-applicable solutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
